title: Hyatt Place debuts in Bihar with Hyatt Place Bodh Gaya
description: Varun Saraf, managing director, Saraf Hotels Enterprises said the company is delighted to introduce the second Hyatt Place hotel in the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Bodh Gaya, after Hampi.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
